name: Taxi Simulator in City
description:
Immerse yourself in the realistic and action-packed taxi simulation with Taxi Simulatır In City! This game is packed with 50+ exciting missions set in a vast city, alongside 13 unique taxi models. Each vehicle has its distinct features, allowing every player to select a ride that matches their style.

While navigating the city, players will encounter lifelike traffic flows and can earn points by safely and swiftly transporting passengers to their destinations. Moreover, the game includes 15 entertaining stunt tracks, offering an exceptional extra feature where players can push their limits and showcase their skills.

With advanced graphics and a detailed city atmosphere, players will experience every facet of urban life. Dynamic weather conditions, day-night cycles, and impressive visual effects further enhance the game's atmosphere.

Taxi Simulatır In City seamlessly blends taxi simulation and arcade entertainment. Experience the authenticity of being a taxi driver while pushing boundaries on exciting stunt tracks. This game presents an unmissable adventure for taxi enthusiasts and action lovers alike. Embark on your journey right away!
